name: Immobile
description:
Immobile is a tough platformer where you cannot walk or run. Instead you have to traverse the 14 levels through a grappling hook and the power of jumping.

Hope you enjoy!

*IF YOUR STUCK ON A LEVEL REMEMBER PATIENCE AND PUZZLE SOLVING ARE KEY*

Edit 1: currently there is a glitch where you cannot see your mouse cursor, I have a fix but just need to be able to resubmit it

Edit 2: Download the game from here -> https://drive.google.com/open?id=1qN2tRIJtcQgY1T4COOuexp1q1gJQ57hi (its exactly the same just you can see the cursor)
